wilter.name: The Wilter
wilter.description: A decaying titan whose presence wilts both life and void alike.

fleeb_raid.name: Fleeb, the Overgrowth
fleeb_raid.description: A malignant ooze swelling with chaotic spores. Parties recommended.
fleeb_raid.aura: Takes slightly more damage from coordinated parties.

staring.name: The Staring
staring.description: An eldritch overseer whose many eyes never blink. Each gaze burns deeper into the soul.
staring.aura: Inflicts fear—slightly reduces party TAC power while active.

ralgulfa.name: Ralgulfa
ralgulfa.description: A twisted husk of bark and bone, Ralgulfa’s hollow maw shrieks with hunger eternal. Its very presence splinters courage.
ralgulfa.aura: Each shriek reduces TAC endurance over time.
